summary:
The Grim souls of Heartless Kinetao are about to perform their last act to devour whole Tamriel. Darker than ever, the evil spreads in the Hearts of the cursed. And drags the Land into all-consuming Darkness.
Using a Handmade Color-palette that adapts the mood of the current scene, dark dungeons and unique effects. Become Heartless with this
descriptionHtml:
[center]LaBeat
presents a finetunedatmospheric
ENB preset

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60180-1-1416655857.jpg[/img][/center]

This is the fourth and Final Preset in the Heartless Kinetao Series.Finally utilising a handmade color palette, this enb offers not only a beautiful color scheme but even unique effects.Dungeons cant be rushed through anymore. Its dark - and you will be grateful for any source of light.[center]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60180-3-1416655857.jpg[/img][/center]
Required:
[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]enb 132

[/url]
Installation:
Use the d3d9.dll from wrapper and the preset files. Copy paste them to your skyrim main folder. thats itDetailed instructions in the download.



[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60180-2-1416655857.jpg[/img][/center]

Trouble shooting:

CoT is not compatible with this enb and will never be - there are enough enbs out there that even require that mod.
Deactivate it.


All other lighting and weather mods are not compatible with this enb.Â RLO seems to work fine with it at first, but fire will burn your eyes out of your skull.

The only mod that seemed to work properly is "Skyrim Relighting".

Double check the enb files you use, do not use this enb with 0.2xx dll binaries.

Do not mess around with different enb files.




The other HK enbs:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59529/?]Heartless Kinetao Cinegraph
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59688/?]Heartless kinetao Eclipse[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58979/?]heartless Kinetao (Original ENB)[/url]
author: LaBeatBeatbox
